name: pdm-extension
description: Private Data Manager - Browser extension for Nillion's SecretVaults

scripts.dev: bun run clean && bun run copy:assets && bun run dev:watch
scripts.dev:watch: bun build src/background/background.ts --outfile dist/background.js --target browser --format esm --sourcemap --watch & bun build src/content/content.ts --outfile dist/content.js --target browser --format esm --sourcemap --watch & bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outfile dist/popup.js --target browser --format esm --sourcemap --watch & bun build src/options/options.ts --outfile dist/options.js --target browser --format esm --sourcemap --watch
scripts.build:dev: bun run clean && bun run compile:dev && bun run copy:assets
scripts.build:prod: bun run clean && bun run compile:prod && bun run copy:assets && bun run package
scripts.compile:dev: bun build src/background/background.ts --outfile dist/background.js --target browser --format esm --define "process.env.PDM_SERVER_URL='http://localhost:3000'" && bun build src/content/content.ts --outfile dist/content.js --target browser --format esm --define "process.env.PDM_SERVER_URL='http://localhost:3000'" && bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outfile dist/popup.js --target browser --format esm --define "process.env.PDM_SERVER_URL='http://localhost:3000'" && bun build src/options/options.ts --outfile dist/options.js --target browser --format esm --define "process.env.PDM_SERVER_URL='http://localhost:3000'"
scripts.compile:prod: bun build src/background/background.ts --outfile dist/background.js --target browser --format esm && bun build src/content/content.ts --outfile dist/content.js --target browser --format esm && bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outfile dist/popup.js --target browser --format esm && bun build src/options/options.ts --outfile dist/options.js --target browser --format esm
scripts.clean: rm -f dist/*.js dist/*.html dist/*.json 2>/dev/null; rm -rf dist/assets 2>/dev/null; mkdir -p dist || true
scripts.copy:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup.html dist/ && cp options.html dist/ && cp src/offscreen/offscreen.html dist/ && cp security_rules.json dist/ && cp src/content/injected-script.js dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: bun run lint:ts && bun run lint:format
scripts.serve: bun run build:dev && python3 -m http.server 8080 -d dist
scripts.start:chrome:
bun run build:dev && echo '
âœ… Extension built!

ðŸ“ WSL Path: \\wsl$\Ubuntu\home\ifycode\dataMang\dist

ðŸ“‹ Load in Chrome:
   1. Open: chrome://extensions/
   2. Enable: Developer mode (top-right)
   3. Click: Load unpacked
   4. Select: dist/ folder
'
scripts.start:firefox:
bun run build:dev && web-ext run --source-dir=./dist --config=./web-ext-config.cjs || echo '
âš ï¸  Firefox not found. Use Chrome instead: bun run start:chrome
'
scripts.load:
bun run build:dev && echo '
âœ… Extension built successfully!

ðŸ“‹ To load in browser:
   Chrome: chrome://extensions/ -> Developer mode ON -> Load unpacked -> Select dist/
   Firefox: about:debugging -> This Firefox -> Load Temporary Add-on -> Select dist/manifest.json
'
scripts.validate: bun run type-check && bun run test && bun run lint
scripts.prepare: bun run validate && bun run build:prod
scripts.analyze:bundle: bun build src/popup/popup.tsx --outdir dist --target browser --format esm --analyze
scripts.build-and-deploy: bun run build:dev && bun run deploy

author: PDM Team
